full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'DUL BA'I GZHUNG LUGS KUN GYI SNYING PO BSDUS PA'I SDOMS KYI TSIGS SU BCAD PA BLO GSAL MGU BA BSKYED PA'I NGO MTSAR 'PHRUL GYI ME LONG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @080A *, ,(CES SER SMAD KONG PO DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN MANG THOS 'DUL BA 'DZIN PA NGAG DBANG TSUL KHRIMS NAS SNGA SOR SER SMAD RANG DU CHOS 'GRIMS SKABS 'PHAGS BOD KYI 'DUL GZHUNG MANG POR THOS BSAM GYIS ZHUGS PA'I LAG RJES 'DUL GZHUNG KUN GYI SNYING PO BSDUS PA'I TSIGS ZIN THOR BKOD PA 'DI NYID, DUS PHYIS GZHUNG LUGS LA THOS BSAM GYIS 'JUG PA'I BLO GSAL DON GNYER CAN RNAMS DANG, TSUL KHRIMS LA NYAMS LEN SNYING PO BYED PA KUN LA MKHO CHE BAR YOD 'DUG NA'ANG, DPE RGYUN DKON ZHING, 'GA' ZHIG NAS 'DRI BAR BRTZAMS KYANG MTHUN RKYEN 'DZOMS MIN DANG, BRIS ZIN 'GA' ZHIG KYANG YI GE LHAG CHAD DANG SDEB SBYOR DAG MIN CI RIGS PAR BRTEN, CHOS GRVA PA RNAMS NAS KYANG 'DI NYID PAR DU 'KHOD PA ZHIG BYUNG NA KUN LA PHAN CHE BAR YOD TSOD 'DUG CES YANG YANG GRENG RKYEN GYIS SER SMAD KONG PO DGE SLONG YI SHES CHOS 'BYOR DANG, DGE SLONG YE SHES BSKAL BZANG GNYIS NAS KONG PO DA MO'I SDE ZUR NYI MA DBUS PHEBS SKABS PAR GYI MTHUN RKYEN SBYIN BSKUL ZHUS PA LTAR, 'BYOR LDAN CHOS KYI SBYIN BDAG LDE ZUR NYI MA TSE RING NAS GTZO BOR RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE YUN DU GNAS PA'I LHAG BSAM DANG, ,GNAS SKABS DE LDE RANG NYID DANG, MA BDE SKYID, RDO RJE, BU MO DPAL MO, ,BU NOR BU BCAS DANG, TSE 'DAS DZA SAG DON 'GRUB RAB RGYAS, MA DPAL 'JOMS SOGS NYE 'BREL 'DAS GSON RNAMS KYI TSOGS BSAGS SGRIB SBYONG GI SLAD DU PAR DU BSKUN PA'I PAR BYANG SMON TSIG ZHIG DGOS TSUL BYUNG BA LTAR, ^SKU BCAR DAR HAN MKHAN SPRUL BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS RNAM RGYAL GYIS SBYAR BA STE, 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BSTAN SNYING PO DAM CHOS 'DUL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE YUN DU GNAS PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
